title: Flap with Friends
paragraphs: A web remake of the infamous Flappy Bird video game, utilizing WebGL for performance and built into a Docker container for portability.
bullets: Solely designed and developed the entire web application from planning, research, and prototyping to programing, quality assurance, deployment, and gathering feedback.

Constructed a themed and responsive single page application with customized Bootstrap 4.0 styling, optimized search engine meta tags (SEO), and utilized many of the newest technologies and web protocols.
Built using Bash (Unix shell), Bootstrap, Cloudflare, CSS, Docker, Figma, Gatsby.js, Java 8, JavaScript, Kubernetes, Pixi.js, React.js, Redux, Spring Boot, and Spring WebFlux.
